title: 安装Fabric时Fabric安装程序崩溃
author: MC忠实粉丝2
txt_content:
如题，Fabric版本为0.5.2.39（萌新一枚，只会装Forge.不知道Fabic怎么搞)
崩溃报告如下：
        
java.net.ConnectException: Connection timed out: connect
        at java.net.DualStackPlainSocketImpl.connect0(Native Method)
        at java.net.DualStackPlainSocketImpl.socketConnect(Unknown Source)
        at java.net.AbstractPlainSocketImpl.doConnect(Unknown Source)
        at java.net.AbstractPlainSocketImpl.connectToAddress(Unknown Source)
        at java.net.AbstractPlainSocketImpl.connect(Unknown Source)
        at java.net.PlainSocketImpl.connect(Unknown Source)
        at java.net.SocksSocketImpl.connect(Unknown Source)
        at java.net.Socket.connect(Unknown Source)
        at sun.security.ssl.SSLSocketImpl.connect(Unknown Source)
        at sun.security.ssl.BaseSSLSocketImpl.connect(Unknown Source)
        at sun.net.NetworkClient.doConnect(Unknown Source)
        at sun.net.www.http.HttpClient.openServer(Unknown Source)
        at sun.net.www.http.HttpClient.openServer(Unknown Source)
        at sun.net.www.protocol.https.HttpsClient.<init>(Unknown Source)
        at sun.net.www.protocol.https.HttpsClient.New(Unknown Source)
        at sun.net.www.protocol.https.AbstractDeleg ... on.getNewHttpClient(Unknown Source)
        at sun.net.www.protocol.http.HttpURLConnection.plainConnect0(Unknown Source)
        at sun.net.www.protocol.http.HttpURLConnection.plainConnect(Unknown Source)
        at sun.net.www.protocol.https.AbstractDelegateHttpsURLConnection.connect(Unknown Source)
        at sun.net.www.protocol.http.HttpURLConnection.getInputStream0(Unknown Source)
        at sun.net.www.protocol.http.HttpURLConnection.getInputStream(Unknown Source)
        at sun.net.www.protocol.https.HttpsURLConnectionImpl.getInputStream(Unknown Source)
        at net.fabricmc.installer.util.MetaHandler.load(MetaHandler.java:45)
        at net.fabricmc.installer.InstallerGui.<init>(InstallerGui.java:43)
        at net.fabricmc.installer.InstallerGui.start(InstallerGui.java:62)
        at net.fabricmc.installer.Main.main(Main.java:83)

jar,exe均尝试过，同样报错

replies.author: wjwrh
replies.txt_content:
这个应该是网络问题
可以多尝试几次或者挂代理，如果解决不了的话用别人现成的整合包吧
https://www.mcbbs.net/thread-869469-1-1.html

replies.author: もぺもぺ
replies.txt_content:
网络问题，可再试几次。

或者试试整合包 https://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?mod=viewthread&tid=869469

replies.author: EmptyLava
replies.txt_content:
连接超时
来用已经整合好的客户端吧
[1.15.2-1.7.10]能力整合-Forge/FabricAPI下的基础整合[持续更新]
https://www.mcbbs.net/thread-869469-1-1.html
(出处: Minecraft(我的世界)中文论坛)

replies.author: wjwrh
replies.txt_content:
wjwrh 发表于 2020-5-9 19:47

可以多尝试几次或者挂代理，如果解决不了的话用别人现成的整合包吧

谢谢
